author: Matthew Impelli
title: New York Police Commissioner Says 15 Percent of Uniformed Officers Are Out Sick Amid Coronavirus Pandemic
description: On Tuesday, New York Police Department (NYPD) Commissioner Dermot Shea stated that 15 percent of uniformed officers have called out sick amid the coronavirus pandemic.
content:
On Tuesday, New York Police Department (NYPD) Commissioner Dermot Shea stated that 15 percent of uniformed officers have called out sick amid the coronavirus pandemic.
"We're at about 15 percent of the uniform force is out sick," Shea said during a Facebook … [+2283 chars]
